description.value: When you roll a success on a save against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. In addition, any time you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} condition, reduce the condition's value by 1. As usual, this ability reduces the initial frightened condition by 1, so if you have multiple similar abilities, they don't both take effect.

name: Fear No Law, Fear No One
